Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict this match has the ingredients of being a thriller as both teams eye 2 points.
An India win would help cement their position in the semifinals, while a defeat would extend their wait for a guaranteed spot.
South Africa feels unlucky to miss out on a point against Zimbabwe and aims to put on a dominating show against India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match has the potential to be a thriller with both teams looking for 2 points.
India will take on South Africa in a crunch Group 2 encounter at the Perth Stadium on Sunday.
Others: Virat Kohli is a great contender to be a captain or a vice-captain due to his form and average.
Suryakumar Yadav and Rohit Sharma are other sure-shot selections from among the India batters.
Rilee Rossouw and David Miller can be considered among the batters from South Africa.
